items.sentence: It took almost thirteen hours, but the team of surgeons was able to save Tom's life.
Tom got to the main gate at the time he and Mary agreed on, but she never showed up.
It would be wise to remember that Tom can't do things as well as the rest of us can.
Doing that won't be too difficult, but it's something that'll require a lot of time.
The company's competitive edge will be eroded if system engineers continue to leave.
After six hours' climbing, we finally succeeded in reaching the top of the mountain.
Tom and Mary complain often that they never get to be together without the children.
Tom considers Mary his girlfriend, but she doesn't consider him to be her boyfriend.
Every time I see Tom's picture, I remember how much fun it was to hang out with him.
Tom said goodbye to his family and his wife, thinking he might never see them again.
